core.net

Interface TransferListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller, RequestController, TransferController

    public interface TransferListener
    Transfer Listener Listens to the stages of a transfer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleComplete()
      Invoked when a transfer has been completed
      void handleMessage(Message msg)
      Invoked when a message has been received
      void handleSendMessage(Message msg)
      Invoked when a send message is send from a transfer
      void handleStart()
      Invoked when a transfer is started
